Directions: In a Dutch oven or soup kettle, saute onion and garlic in oil until tender. Add the next 10 ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer after 45 minutes.
Stir in the chicken; cook 15 minutes longer or until chicken is heated through and barley is tender.
Ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained
